definition: scope of authority/extent of power/(access etc) privileges

sentences.english: Permissions will be controlled by a business manager or IT administrator.
sentences.chinese: 权限将由业务经理或IT管理员控制。

sentences.english: This, of course, is the bare minimum and restricts only administrative access.
sentences.chinese: 这当然是最小设置，仅仅限制管理访问权限。

sentences.english: You can also set permissions using octal numbers instead of symbols.
sentences.chinese: 您还可以使用八进制取代符号设置权限。

sentences.english: With convincing power he portrayed the usurpation and corruptions of the papal see.
sentences.chinese: 他有力地抨击罗马教廷僭越权限和腐化败坏的行为。

sentences.english: Perform a window handle validation of higher process privilege.
sentences.chinese: 执行高进程权限的窗口句柄确认。

sentences.english: This forum is powered by Phorum.
sentences.chinese: 抱歉，您在本论坛没有浏览权限。

sentences.english: This act is indubitably an act of authority.
sentences.chinese: 这种行为无疑就是一种权限的行为。

sentences.english: You can approach the problem of how to grant these people access in two ways.
sentences.chinese: 可以用两种方式来解决如何为这些人授予权限的问题。

sentences.english: The folder "%B" cannot be deleted because you do not have permissions to read it.
sentences.chinese: 无法处理文件夹“%B”，因为您没有读取它的权限。

sentences.english: Projects are invite-only, and users can choose who the collaborators will be and determine permissions for each person.
sentences.chinese: 所有项目都是邀请制，用户可以选择合作者及其权限。

sentences.english: Without judicial review, statutory limits would be naught but empty words.
sentences.chinese: 没有司法审查，法定权限将只是一句空话。

sentences.english: You do not have sufficient privilege to create a new database diagram.
sentences.chinese: 您没有足够权限来新建数据库图表。

sentences.english: Enhance and maintain LANs and WANs to ensure proper level of service.
sentences.chinese: 提高和维护局域网和广域网，以确保服务的权限。

sentences.english: Digital Rights Expression Laguage (REL) is the kernel of Digital Rights Management.
sentences.chinese: 数字权限表达语言是数字权限管理技术的核心之一。

sentences.english: Digital Rights Expression Laguage (REL) is the kernel of Digital Rights Management.
sentences.chinese: 数字权限表达语言是数字权限管理技术的核心之一。

sentences.english: A project-level group provides permissions only for that project.
sentences.chinese: 专案层级群组只会提供该专案的使用权限。

definition: right (i.e. an entitlement to sth)/(classical) power and wealth
to have the right to/to be entitled to/to have authority/powerful
ability to make one's own decisions
